BOX::

As he opens it, a small hologram shows up.  It's an image of KitKat, 
standing about 6 inches tall from inside the box.  It smiled up at 
Drillbit. It's KitKat's voice as it says,"Hello my love. If you are 
looking at this, then I must have died.  I hope I died well in 
battle, bringing honor and glory to the Predacons.  I had hoped that 
we would have been together longer. But it would seem that the matrix 
has other plans for us. I love you Drillbit. With all my spark, I 
love you. I need you now, more than ever. Please take care of the 
group.  I know that you and I shared the same views. Please take care 
of my legacy and take care of my team for me. Watch over them and 
bring them into greatness as I know you can. I love you Drillbit. I 
always have. And always will. Please forgive me for any wrongs I may 
have committed against you. I love you and if you are seeing this, 
then know this. I died without regrets, save one. My only regret was 
that I died and left you behind. I hope that someday, the matrix will 
aloow me to see you again. I love you Drillbit. KiKat sighing off."

The image faded for a moment. Then it replayed the same message. 

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::DrillBit::
> 
> He takes the box and opens it. He sees...
> 
> OOC: Whats in it?
